title: Himi 324
lyrics:
5.5.5.11.
1.
Ko e fonua,
‘O hotau ‘Eiki,
Ko Imanuela;
‘Oku ne teu ia mo hono kakai.
2.
Tau fai ‘a e teu
Ki he fonua,
Kuo fakahā;
Ko e tupu fo’ou, ‘i he ‘Otua.
3.
Pea ka tau ka
Ongo’i ia,
Pea tau hao;
‘O ma’u ‘a e ‘ofa, ‘a e ‘Otua.
4.
Ko e mamahi,
‘I hotau sino,
Mei hotau ‘Eiki;
Ko hotau ‘auhani, ke tau mo’ui.
5.
Ke tau tokanga,
Ki hotau ‘Eiki,
Mo ‘ene fekau;
Pea ngāue ma’u pē, ki hono kakai.
6.
Ke tau li’aki,
‘Etau mo’ui,
Ki hotau ‘Eiki,
Pea ke tau tui, ke tau hao ai.
7.
Ke tau kātaki,
‘Etau masiva,
‘I he māmani;
Tau ma’u ‘i hēvani, ‘etau koloa.*
